title: Question about Jhin's eyes
body:
How come in Jhin's square icon his eyes are blue but in the splash art they are orange? Is this a mistake or on purpose, and if so, why?
http://gameinfo.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/champions/jhin/

replies.body: Well, the splash shows only his left eye, which is hazel/orange/brown, while the icon shows his right eye, which is blue. So maybe he has heterochromia :O
